attributes.action: Elected M.P's should respect Constituency's views before Party Lines.
attributes.additional_details: My M.P. has again voted against her constituency's views on leaving the E,U, as she has to follow the party line which is in direct contradiction of what she promised to do in Parliament.
attributes.background: M.P's are not respecting constituencies views as Party lines take preference even though they are supposed to represent the people first.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/269912
